conbody.p: OS commands can be triggered using Katalon Recorder Helper. Users can combine this function with user extensions (Extension Scripts (extension.js) for Custom Locator Builders and Locators) to extend Katalon Recorder's capability.
For example, a call to the following URL
will make the tool execute the "dir" command and return the following response in JSON format
conbody.codeblock: { "command": "dir", "output": [ " Volume in drive D is Data", " Volume Serial Number is 1031-445A", "", " Directory of D:\\katalon-recorder-helper", "", "05/17/2018 12:55 PM <DIR> .", "05/17/2018 12:55 PM <DIR> ..", "05/15/2018 09:17 AM 268 .gitignore", "05/17/2018 01:14 PM <DIR> .idea", "05/17/2018 11:58 AM 1,090 LICENSE", "05/17/2018 12:47 PM 1,488 pom.xml", "05/17/2018 12:26 PM 500 README.md", "05/15/2018 04:17 PM <DIR> src", "05/17/2018 12:55 PM <DIR> target", " 4 File(s) 3,346 bytes", " 5 Dir(s) 155,350,253,568 bytes free" ] }
